24426.<pc>は 立て札を読んだ。\nしかし こちらは 裏側だった！\n<end>:

26900.<left>ながめは いかがでしたか？\n<left>またのご来場を お待ちして:
<left>How was the view?
<left>We look forward to seeing you again soon.

26902.<left>こちらの展望台からは 真下に見えるガタラ湖を\n<left>一望する:
<left>From this lookout, you can see the entirety of
<left>Gatara Lake directly below.

27060.<center>―この先 凶悪魔物 出没注意！―\n<center>どうしても進:
― Beware fiendish monsters ahead! ―
  If you must proceed, prepare at our shop!
～ Tent merchants, Scorpion Company

← Calsadora Volcano
→ Road to Dolworm Kingdom

27067.<left>柵の向こうへ行くには ゴブル砂漠の北東より\n<left>トロッコを:

27073.<left>←ゴブル砂漠東\n<right>この先の危険地帯を抜けると ボロヌス:
← Goble Desert East
→ Boronus Lava Flow beyond the dangerous area
Go to Lava Flow from the north if unskilled.

27074.<left>ここより 砂岩の洞くつ\n<left>砂と骨ばかりの 不毛の地。:
<left>From here is the Sandstone Cave, a barren land
<left>of sand and bone.

27075.<center>寄ってらっしゃい 見てらっしゃい！\n<center>砂嵐にも負:
Come on by and take a look!
We're open for business despite the sandstorm!

27076.<center>↑砂岩の洞くつ\n<left>←ボロヌス溶岩流\n<right>:
↑ Sandstone Cave
← Boronus Lava Flow
→ Goble Desert East

27134.<left>この先の地下洞を抜け\n<left>南に進めば ザグバン丘陵。:
<left>Go south through the underground caves ahead
<left>to reach Zagban Hills.

27135.<left>ここより ラニアッカ断層帯\n<left>地形が複雑なので \n<l:
<left>From here is the Raniakka Fault Zone with
<left>complex terrain so don't get lost.

27140.<left>この先注意！\n<left>地形が複雑なので\n<left>迷子にな:
<left>Caution ahead!
<left>The terrain is complex, so don't get lost.

27141.<left>この先にある\n<left>地中から光を放つ 大地の裂け目は\n<l:
<left>Up ahead
<left>The crack in the earth that emits light from
<left>below the ground is called the River of Light.

27147.<center>↑モガレキャンプ\n<left>←モガレ修道院\n<center:
↑ Mogare Camp
← Mogare Monastery
↓ Gatara Fields

27149.<left>橋を渡ると モガレの洞くつ。\n<left>西へ進むと モガレキャン:
<left>Across the bridge is Mogare Cave.
<left>To the west is Mogare Camp.

27151.<left>この先 モガレの洞くつ\n<left>戦いを好まぬ者は 立ち寄るべか:
<left>Mogare Cave ahead
<left>Those who don't like to fight should not come.

← Daraz Quarry

27174.<left>遠くに見えるのは 防砂ダム。\n<left>湧き砂の管理のため 太古:

↑ Gatara Fields
← Road to Ancient Altar

27181.<left>この先 行き止まり。\n<left>岳都ガタラに行く場合は\n<le:

27182.<left>この先 太古の祭壇。\n<left>現在 研究中のため 立ち入り禁止:

27183.<left>ここより サーマリ高原。\n<left>岳都ガタラに 行く場合は\n:

27184.<left>←ザグバン丘陵\n<right>道なり 太古の祭壇→\n<cente:
← Zagban Hills
→ Road to Ancient Altar
↓ Gatara Fields

27267.<left>決して 魔物の骨に 近づいてはならない。\n<left>さもなくば:
<left>Never go near the bones of a monster.
<left>Otherwise, you too will wander the land of the
<left>dead as bones.

27429.<left>この ヘドロの沼の緑色は\n<left>溶岩の地層が 溶けだした色と:
<left>The green color of this sludge swamp is said
<left>to be the result of molten lava formations,
<left>and is not harmful to the body.

27430.<left>これより ボロヌスの穴。\n<left>紋章光る水底に 魔を封ずる牢:
<left>From here is the Boronus Hole.
<left>At the water's bottom is a prison that seals
<left>monsters.

27431.<left>この先のガケより 飛び降り\n<left>さまよい果てた旅人は 数知:
<left>There are many travelers who have jumped off
<left>the cliffs ahead of us and ended up here. Be
<left>aware, reckless courage will be your downfall.

27436.<left>この先 王立研究院 未調査区域。\n<left>多大な魔瘴が眠る可能:

<left>A large amount of magic miasma may lie within.
<left>Be careful.

<left>Across the river is a statue of the three
<left>warriors of the earth, who have been watching
<left>over Gatara since ancient times.

42229.ラニアッカ断層帯にある\n古代の転送装置に 戻りますか？<yesno 2><cl: Return to the ancient transporter in the Raniakka Fault Zone?<yesno 2><close>

44135.<left><pc>は\n<left>石版に刻まれた文字を読んだ。\n<bw_c:
<left>You read the words engraved on the tablet.
<bw_clear>
            Only knowing is not wise
    See the whole world with your own eyes

44583.<left>ずいぶんと使い古された\n<left>年季の入った地図だ。: <left>It's a very old and worn out map.

45498.<left>この周辺 断層のひずみあり！\n<left>地形が複雑になっているの:
<left>There's fault strain around here!
<left>The terrain is complex, so don't get lost.

45502.<left>役に立たないモノ 役に立たないヒト\n<left>ガラクタ城まで ぜ:
If you got useless things or are useless
yourself, please come to the Junk Castle.
～ Duston, Castle Owner

45503.<center>忘れ物リスト\n<left>長ぐつ ３個 作業前かけ １個\n<:
Lost and Found List
<left>3 long boots, 1 work apron,
<left>2 very large screws.

45504.<left>三闘士像を臨む 美しい町\n<left>岳都ガタラは 旅人を歓迎しま:
<left>The city of Gatara, overlooking the statue of
<left>the Triad, welcomes all travelers!
<left>But no junk lovers, please!

45505.<left>最近 当駅の駅弁を ありったけ買い占める\n<left>困ったお客様:
<left>Recently, some troublesome customers have been
<left>buying up all the boxed lunch at our station.
<left>Please purchase with compromise.

45506.<left>カルサドラ産の高質な武器なら ベイの武器屋！\n<left>長旅でお:
<left>For high quality weapons from Calsadora, go to
<left>Bei's weapon shop! If you're tired after your
<left>long journey, go see Cecera at the inn!

45507.<left>答えは アグラニの町 でした！\n<left>わかったかな～？\n<:
<left>The answer was the town of Agrani!
<left>Did you get it?
～ Dolworm Riddle Club

45508.<left>ゴブル砂漠は 広大です。\n<left>砂漠を越えるときは 備えを怠:
<left>The Goble Desert is vast.
<left>Be prepared when crossing the desert.

45509.<left>ドルワーム王国の 王立研究院では\n<left>はるかなる 過去の叡:
<left>At the Dolworm Kingdom Royal Research, we are
<left>conducting research to unravel the wisdom of
<left>the distant past to support our future lives.

45510.<left>じゃんけんぽんで あいこになって\n<left>答えは 引き分けでし:
<left>Rock, paper, scissors, draw.
<left>The answer was a draw!
～ Dolworm Riddle Club

45511.<left>みんな 座ったままで 煮物をしてる\n<left>変わった町 ど～こ:
<left>What is the strange town where everyone is
<left>stewing in their seats?
～ Dolworm Riddle Club

45512.<center>命の炎で 防具は強くなる……。\n<center>それが 防具鍛:
With the flame of life, armor becomes tougher.
  That's the POWER of the armorsmith guild.<heart>
～ Armorsmith Guild Headquarters

45513.<left>ドルワーム王国へ ようこそ！\n<left>この都市は 古代の秘石:
<left>Welcome to Dolworm Kingdom!
<left>This city has a high level of culture, thanks
<left>to the ancient secret stone, the Sun Stone.

45514.<left>ばくだん岩と もみじこぞうと\n<left>ガニラスが ケンカをした:
<left>Who would win in a fight between a Rockbomb,
<left>Leafy Larrikin and a Handsome Crab?
～ Dolworm Riddle Club

46366.<pc>は 掲示板を読んだ。\nしかし こちらは 裏側だった！:
You tried to read the bulletin board.
But you're standing on the wrong side!

48529.<left>ここより地上に出て 辺りを見回してみよ。\n<left>ラニアッカが:
<left>Go high up and look around.
<left>The sheer mountains, pride of Raniakka, will
<left>show you the mysteries of nature.

49034.<pc>は\n墓石に刻まれた文字を読んだ。\n<bw_clear>\n魂は カル:
You read the words engraved on the tombstone.
<bw_clear>
The soul is in the depths of Calsadora's land.
The body is at the bottom of Boronus' spring.
The Heavenly Demon Seal was finally fulfilled.
<bw_clear>
My comrade in arms, who died without ever
stepping foot on your homeland. There is no
more need for you to be emboldened by despair.
<bw_clear>
May you rest in peace, knowing that your
descendants have escaped their cursed fate and
are living in prosperity.

49036.<pc>は 石碑を読んだ！\nしかし こちらからは 裏側で読むことができない\n:
You tried to read the stone monument!
But you couldn't read it from the back.
<end>

49898.<left>これより先 凶悪な魔物の目撃報告あり。\n<left>命の惜しい冒険:
<left>There are reports of vicious monsters ahead.
<left>Adventurers who value their life, turn back.
～ Dolworm Kingdom Knights

49899.<left>これより先 凶悪な魔物の目撃報告あり。\n<left>命の惜しい冒険:
<left>There are reports of vicious monsters ahead.
<left>Adventurers who value their life, turn back.
～ Dolworm Kingdom Knights

68409.王者の資格を 求めし者よ。\n己の旅の記憶を巡り すべての試練を打ち破りし時\n:
You who seek to be sovereign. Travel through the memories of your journey and overcome the trials that await.
Open the Hall of Inheritance, and be bestowed with the qualifications of a sovereign.

68410.翼が生えた 人間の像だ。: It's a statue of a human with wings.

117379.<center>↑動力室への資材搬入は こちらから: ↑ Bring materials to the power room.

290605.<pc>は 創造の炉をしらべた。\n<br>\n太陽の石のチカラで 左右の送風装:
closely examines the Forge of Making.
It seems to work by using the power of the Sun Stone to raise the forge's temperature by sending air through the blower on either side.
There are various other mechanisms in place, but they are too complex to understand...
